akas: Yojo Senki: Saga of Tanya the Evil (original title)
Военная хроника маленькой девочки: Сага о злой Тане Russia
Saga of Tanya the Evil World-wide (English title)
akas from release info: Yojo Senki: Saga of Tanya the Evil (original title)
Военная хроника маленькой девочки: Сага о злой Тане Russia
Saga of Tanya the Evil World-wide (English title)

1.title: The Devil of the Rhine

episode of.title: Saga of Tanya the Evil (TV Series 2017– )

1.plot: A mage platoon supplies air support during battle. The leader of the platoon is a little girl--Second Lieutenant Tanya Degurechaff. One of her soldiers realizes something about the Second Lieutenant seems terrifying.

2.title: Prologue

episode of.title: Saga of Tanya the Evil (TV Series 2017– )

2.plot: Tanya's secret background is revealed as an unwilling recipient of reincarnation by a godlike being who demands that she worship him.

3.title: Deus Vult

episode of.title: Saga of Tanya the Evil (TV Series 2017– )

3.plot: More of Tanya's background as a new soldier for the Empire is revealed. She must test dangerous magic jewels amidst interference by the godlike being. Her desperate effort to avoid dangers of a test pilot mage lands her on the front lines.

4.title: Campus Life

episode of.title: Saga of Tanya the Evil (TV Series 2017– )

4.plot: The main forces has arrived to the Rheine theater. Tanya is ordered to leave the front and join the university. During her studies she meet Hans von Zettour and propose him the the first world war and to create a mage battalion.

5.title: My First Battalion

episode of.title: Saga of Tanya the Evil (TV Series 2017– )

5.plot: Tanya's new battalion is off the ground and running, and it's time for them to do their first mission: fight back a massive invasion!

6.title: Beginning of Madness

episode of.title: Saga of Tanya the Evil (TV Series 2017– )

6.plot: After her easy victory over Dakia, it's time for a more difficult mission: aiding the destruction of the Entente Alliance to the north.

7.title: The Battle of the Fjord

episode of.title: Saga of Tanya the Evil (TV Series 2017– )

7.plot: The Empire is launching a seemingly foolish attack on the Entente Alliance in the middle of winter. They lack the supplies to successfully invade, but Tanya realizes that this attack is intended to distract from the real mission.

8.title: Trial by Fire

episode of.title: Saga of Tanya the Evil (TV Series 2017– )

8.plot: The war with the Entente Alliance is done, and it's back to the Rhine for Tanya and her forces. The Republic troops are highly trained and stronger than any she's faced before.

9.title: Preparations for Advance

episode of.title: Saga of Tanya the Evil (TV Series 2017– )

9.plot: The last enemy on the continent is the Republic, and the Empire has come up with a bold plan to take them out. Of course, Tanya is sent to the forefront of this operation, and is forced to take on the entire Republic army by herself!

10.title: The Path to Victory

episode of.title: Saga of Tanya the Evil (TV Series 2017– )

10.plot: Tanya's mission is a success, and the Republic is surrounded and crippled. But on her way back, she runs into a group of allied mages lead by Anton Souix, whose one mission in life is to take down the Devil of the Rhine!

11.title: Resistance

episode of.title: Saga of Tanya the Evil (TV Series 2017– )

11.plot: As Tanya's battalion carries out their final mission, they are attacked by defensive forces. They launch a counterattack, and come out victorious. This seemingly ends the war - but Tanya soon realizes the celebration may be premature.

12.title: How to Use a Victory

episode of.title: Saga of Tanya the Evil (TV Series 2017– )

12.plot: The victory celebration for the 203rd mage battalion has been cut short. Republican forces are still active on the Southern Continent. Generals Zettour and Rudersdorf decide to send Tanya and her battalion to eliminate the enemy once and for all.

imdb.plot outline: For having insulted God, an arrogant Japanese salaryman in the moment of his sudden death is sentenced to be reborn in an alternate universe similar to 1910's Europe, in an empire torn apart by countless wars with all nearby countries. The salaryman is reborn as Second Lieutenant Tanya Degurechaff of the Imperial Army, a 9-year-old soldier girl. Plus this, according to God's words, if she's not able to die a natural death or she refuses to have faith in Him, her soul will leave the circle and be sent to hell for the countless sins that Tanya has committed in her previous life. In search for an escape, Tanya decides to enter into the Empire's Mages Division, hoping to reach a high enough rank as fast as possible to remain far from the battlefield and in this way avoid the risk of being killed. Even if she's now forced to speak with a young girl's lisp, Tanya soon turns into a ruthless soldier who prioritizes efficiency and her own career over anything else.
imdb.title: Saga of Tanya the Evil
plot: For having insulted God, an arrogant Japanese salaryman in the moment of his sudden death is sentenced to be reborn in an alternate universe similar to 1910's Europe, in an empire torn apart by countless wars with all nearby countries. The salaryman is reborn as Second Lieutenant Tanya Degurechaff of the Imperial Army, a 9-year-old soldier girl. Plus this, according to God's words, if she's not able to die a natural death or she refuses to have faith in Him, her soul will leave the circle and be sent to hell for the countless sins that Tanya has committed in her previous life. In search for an escape, Tanya decides to enter into the Empire's Mages Division, hoping to reach a high enough rank as fast as possible to remain far from the battlefield and in this way avoid the risk of being killed. Even if she's now forced to speak with a young girl's lisp, Tanya soon turns into a ruthless soldier who prioritizes efficiency and her own career over anything else.::gadiel philip
